The Prime Minister has settled the composition sf the various Committees, the future member-ship of which will accordingly be as shown on pages 2-14 of the list.(Sgd.) M. P. A. hankey secretary, Cabinet.2, Whitehall Gardens,.W. 128th November, 1935, 9 /i 0 6 % ;jLIST OF CABINET COMMITTEES.COMMITTEE OF HOME AFFAIRS. SUPPLY AND TRANSPORT COMMITTEE. PRODUCE MARKETS SUPPLY COMMITTEE. IRISH SITUATION COMMITTEE. POLITICAL COMMITTEE.COMMITTEE ON POLITICAL AND ECONOMIC RELATIONS WITH JAPAN. GENERAL PURPOSES COMMITTEE. EDUCATIONAL POLICY COMMITTEE.
